unnormalised: Rental Agreements Got You Confused? Don't Fret, Yaar!
normalised: Rental Agreements Got You Confused? Don't Fret, Friend!

unnormalised: Mumbai: Navigating rental agreements can be more confusing than a Karan Johar plot twist, right? But don't worry, we're here to break it down for you! Landlords in Bandra asking for the moon? Tenants in Delhi unsure about their rights? Relax!
normalised: Mumbai: Navigating rental agreements can be more confusing than a Karan Johar plot twist, right? But don't worry, we're here to break it down for you! Landlords in Bandra asking for the moon? Tenants in Delhi unsure about their rights? Relax!

unnormalised: New guidelines are dropping soon-ish, aiming to simplify the whole process. Think clearer clauses, standardised formats, and less 'chakkar' overall. The IIM Ahmedabad's real estate cell is even advising the government on best practices.
normalised: New guidelines are dropping soon-ish, aiming to simplify the whole process. Think clearer clauses, standardized formats, and less 'chakkar' overall. The I I M Ahmedabad's real estate cell is even advising the government on best practices.

unnormalised: Key things to watch out for? Lock-in periods, security deposits (nobody wants to pay Rs. 50,000 upfront!), and those pesky maintenance charges. Make sure everything's in black and white, folks! And remember, a little negotiation can go a long way. So, channel your inner bargain-hunter and get that sweet deal on your new pad near Marine Drive. Happy renting!
normalised: Key things to watch out for? Lock-in periods, security deposits (nobody wants to pay rupee fifty thousand upfront!), and those pesky maintenance charges. Make sure everything's in black and white, folks! And remember, a little negotiation can go a long way. So, channel your inner bargain-hunter and get that sweet deal on your new pad near Marine Drive. Happy renting!
